Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class InputParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.InputParser
public class InputParser extends Object
Class InputParser handles players' input from CLI and interprets it accordingly to the Client State. The object created from it are transferred to ClientMessageBuilder in order to build a message to Server.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public ArrayList<Object> parse(String input, ClientState state)
      Method parse receives the players' input and dispatches it to the proper method in order to interpret its meaning.
      Parameters:
      input - player's textual input.
      state - client's state information used to properly translate the textual information.
      Returns:
      ArrayList carrying the object interpretation of the player's input.

    • parseQuitInput

      private boolean parseQuitInput(String input)
      Method parseQuitInput verifies if a player is explicitly closing the game by writing a quit message.
      Parameters:
      input - player's textual input.
      Returns:
      true if the player has written "quit", false otherwise.

    • decrementIndexes

      private ArrayList<Integer> decrementIndexes(ArrayList<Integer> indexes)
      Method decrementIndexes translates human-readable indexes (counting starts from 1) to computer-readable indexes (counting starts from 0).
      Parameters:
      indexes - list of indexes that have to be decremented.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of decremented indexes.

    • convertStringsToNumberArray

      private ArrayList<Integer> convertStringsToNumberArray(String[] array)
      Method convertStringsToNumberArray converts a string array to a number array.
      Parameters:
      array - array of strings representing player's input text.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of numbers from strings.

    • convertStringsToColorArray

      private ArrayList<Color> convertStringsToColorArray(String[] array)
      Method convertStringsToColorArray converts an array of strings representing a Color instance to a Color instance.
      Parameters:
      array - array of color names as strings.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Color instances representing the color names.

    • setIsExpert

      public void setIsExpert(boolean isExpert)
      Method setIsExpert sets the boolean flag isExpert to true or false according to the game mode
      Parameters:
      isExpert - true if expert mode is enabled, false otherwise.
